messages.content: What is the purpose of the Prompt Quill ComfyUI custom nodes?
The custom nodes for Prompt Quill in ComfyUI allow users to integrate the power of Prompt Quill into their ComfyUI workflows.
What are the installation steps for the Prompt Quill ComfyUI custom nodes?
The installation steps are: 1. Install ComfyUI, 2. git clone the custom nodes into the 'custom_nodes' folder or use the ComfyUI Manager to install via git URL, and 3. Start/restart ComfyUI.
Which node provides the ability to query Prompt Quill via a given prompt?
The PromptQuillGenerate node provides the ability to query Prompt Quill via a given prompt.
What is the purpose of the PromptQuillSailing node?
The PromptQuillSailing node allows users to explore and create new prompts based on the vast ocean of data Prompt Quill uses, taking them on a journey along the data to find amazing prompts.
How can a user start a new journey from a new starting point in the PromptQuillSailing node?
To start a new journey from a new starting point, the user must set 'journey_reset' to true for at least one image and then back to false. This resets the journey's history on the Prompt Quill side.
Why is it necessary to reset the journey in the PromptQuillSailing node?
Resetting the journey is necessary because ComfyUI is stateless, and this is the only way to reset the journey's history on the Prompt Quill side.
Are there plans to add more nodes to the Prompt Quill ComfyUI custom nodes in the future?
Yes, more nodes are planned to be added to the Prompt Quill ComfyUI custom nodes soon.
